summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE POWER STEERING WAS FAULTY AND THE STEERING WHEEL SEIZED  MANY TIMES WHEN ATTEMPTING TO TURN. THE POWER STEERING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC STATED THAT THE POWER STEERING SEIZED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO MEDFORD FORD (186 NJ-70, MEDFORD, NJ 08055, (888) 508-9703), BUT NO ASSISTANCE WAS PROVIDED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 59,319.
